text:
Deep 6 AI | Front End/React Dev | https://deep6.ai | Full time | Pasadena, CA | Onsite only, no relocation offered

Deep 6 Analytics is looking for an front end developer who wants to play a big role in building our revolutionary artificial intelligence platform for healthcare. As a member of our team, you will work with the business to take ideas from conception to production. You will significantly influence the direction of the front end architecture and ensure the excellence of our user experience.

We're passionate about creating software that is directly improving our healthcare system! If this interests you, please apply at https://deep6.ai/careers/react-front-end-developer/
